description: Feisty Tamra Toryn makes a splash (sorry!) in her WB debut. In the preshoot interview she mentioned that she had always wanted to try bdsm games but never had the opportunity. We were glad to show her the ropes. (Ewww, I did it again!) Tamra did seem to take to this type of play well and even showed some spunk. I think the picture in the update showing her sticking her tongue out at me proves that. Thanks for coming Tamra, you were lots of fun.
title: Tamra Toryn
